title: How many matcches do you get put in low priority for being afk?
body:
So I had to go afk for a few minutes (folks told me to vaccume real quick) I asked my teammates if it was ok and they were cool about it.

When I tried to play another game after we won (i came back in time and helped us win) i had a 20 minute punishment. i can understand why I got the punishment, (though 20 min seems a bit extreme for a first afk offense) but its been 4 games in a row with the afk 20 minute low priority.

How many more games will be like that? (it never told me)

replies.body:
idk if you're on the beta client or not, legacy client does tell you after you finish a game.


Normally, unless you do it over and over, will be 5 games with priority queue.
Np, i think they will add the notification to the new client at official release alot with item sets and all that jazz at the same time
It normally goes in intervals of 5.
